tweet: Today is National Vietnam War Veterans Day and I want to thank each of you who served our country during that war. Your fellow Americans are grateful for the sacrifices you have endured on our behalf. #VietnamWarVeteransDay

Today, @repjohnlewis and I introduced landmark legislation to reform the IRS and focus its mission on being a "service-first agency." We need the IRS to work for taxpayers because the status quo is failing them.
